Gene-commentary.Gene-commentary_heading: RefSeqs of Annotated Genomes: Danio rerio Annotation Release 106

Gene-commentary.Gene-commentary_text: Role of beta-glucosidase 2 in aberrant glycosphingolipid metabolism: model of glucocerebrosidase deficiency in zebrafish.
Upregulation of miR-155 is a common denominator across different neurodegenerative disorders including GBA1 deficiency present in Gaucher disease.
